lead_paragraph: England wasted a second-half lead in a 2-1 loss at Russia and jeopardized its chances of making next year’s European Championship. The defending champion Greece, the Czech Republic and Romania clinched berths with victories, and Scotland’s bid was damaged with a 2-0 loss at Georgia. Thierry Henry scored twice to break Michel Platini’s French national team scoring record in a 2-0 qualifying victory over Lithuania.
